name: Pazuru
description:
Use your ninja reflexes to solve
puzzles in this easy to learn, hard to
master puzzle game. Twist, bounce,
warp and toggle your way through the
levels. Collect all the stars and be a
true ninja master!

Game features:
- Over 70 brain-twisting levels
- Create custom levels with the
built-in level editor
- Share levels online and offline via
QR Code
